A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The plot of this movie is completely incoherent and riddled with holes. There are countless moments and decisions that went into the production of Star Wars 8\, for which I cannot understand the logic behind\, because there is none. It is the worst Star Wars movie to date by far. The visuals are great\, but with the amount of money Disney put into this\, you would expect that. The only redeeming qualities is has are the performances of Mark Hamill and Adam Driver\, however that isn't enough to save it from a 1-star rating.
